name: In category Order
author: bainternet

sections.description:
This plugin lets you set the order of posts on a category basis with a simple Drag N Drop interface.

features

  • Set posts order using Drag N Drop.
  • Set Order Per category.
  • Works With every theme out of the box.

any feedback or suggestions are welcome.

check out my other plugins
sections.installation:
Simple steps:

  1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.

  2. Then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

  3. Edit the category you want to set a custom order for.

  4. Done.
sections.changelog:
